title: Germany’s Leader Merz Delivers a Blunt Warning to China on Trade
summary_full: Chancellor Friedrich Merz laid out his complaints in a frank message to his hosts on a trip to Beijing that China had designed to showcase their relationship.
summary_public: Chancellor Friedrich Merz laid out his complaints in a frank message to his hosts on a trip to Beijing that China had designed to showcase their relationship.

DE.label: positive
